timeSeriesQuery.timeSeriesQueryLanguage:
{ fetch k8s_container
  | { metric kubernetes.io/container/cpu/core_usage_time
      | rate
      | every 1m
      | align next_older(2m)
    ; metric kubernetes.io/container/cpu/request_cores
      | align next_older(2m) }
  | group_by [resource.namespace_name], .sum()
  | outer_join 0
  | div
; fetch k8s_container
  | { metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/cpu/core_usage_time
      | rate
      | every 1m
      | align next_older(2m)
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/cpu/request_cores
      | align next_older(2m) }
  | group_by [resource.namespace_name], .sum()
  | outer_join 0
  | div }
| union
| top 5
| scale "%"

{ fetch k8s_container
  | metric kubernetes.io/container/cpu/core_usage_time
  | align rate(1m)
  | every 1m
  | group_by [resource.namespace_name], .sum()
; fetch k8s_container
  | metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/cpu/core_usage_time
  | align rate(1m)
  | every 1m
  | group_by [resource.namespace_name], .sum() }
| union
| top 5

{ fetch k8s_container
  | metric kubernetes.io/container/cpu/request_cores
  | align next_older(1m)
  | every 1m
  | group_by [resource.namespace_name], .sum()
; fetch k8s_container
  | metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/cpu/request_cores
  | align next_older(1m)
  | every 1m
  | group_by [resource.namespace_name], .sum() }
| union
| top 5

{ fetch k8s_container
  | { metric kubernetes.io/container/cpu/request_cores
    ; metric kubernetes.io/container/cpu/core_usage_time
      | rate
      | every 1m }
  | align next_older(2m)
  | group_by [resource.namespace_name], .sum()
  | join
  | sub
; fetch k8s_container
  | { metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/cpu/request_cores
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/cpu/core_usage_time
      | rate
      | every 1m }
  | align next_older(2m)
  | group_by [resource.namespace_name], .sum()
  | join
  | sub }
| union
| top 5
